vtkScenario Class Reference

Implementation of the simulation scenario. All the elements in the scenario (organs, tools...) are stored in collections. More...

#include <vtkScenario.h>

Detailed Description

Implementation of the simulation scenario. All the elements in the scenario (organs, tools...) are stored in collections.

void vtkScenario::InsertOrgan ( vtkIdType  index,
vtkOrgan *  organ 
)

Insert an organ in the specified position.

If the given position is not empty, the content is replaced by the new model

Parameters:
index index of the list where the organ will be added
organ vtkOrgan object to be inserted
See also:
InsertNextOrgan(vtkOrgan * organ)
Returns:
false if the insert operation was not correctly completed
void vtkScenario::InsertTool ( vtkIdType  index,
vtkTool *  tool 
)

Insert a tool in a given position in the scenario.

If the given position is not empty, the content is replaced by the new model

Parameters:
index index of the tool to be inserted
tool vtkTool object to be inserted
Returns:
false if the insert operation was not correctly completed
void vtkScenario::RemoveOrgan ( vtkIdType  index  ) 

Delete the organ at the specified id from the scenario.

It will only remove the organ from the collection, it does not free memory

Parameters:
index index of the organ to be removed
Returns:
false if the model could not be deleted
void vtkScenario::RemoveTool ( vtkIdType  index  ) 

Delete the tool at the specified id from the scenario.

It will only remove the tool from the collection, it does not liberate the memory

Returns:
false if the model could not be deleted

void vtkScenario::Update (  ) 

Update the whole Scenario.

Collision Detection is processed. If any contact has occurred the related tools and organs will be updated
